title: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig - Commentary on Chapter 4
description:
Up to the mountains again, this time with a pile of anthropology books and a lot of hope  - only to have it dashed (temporarily). The term "cultural immune system" is introduced, and Pheadrus discovers another ghost. 

Pirsig BBC interview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m8zdT5jYlro
